card.title: Welcome to encodeBiz SaaS
card.subtitle: Register, control and manage access in one place, PassBiz ready for you and soon CheckBiz.

cardDesc.subtitle1: At Encodebiz we create tailored solutions for unique needs.
cardDesc.subtitle2: If your company requires specialized development, we are ready to make it happen.

card.title: Create Legal Entity
card.subtitle: On the platform you can associate multiple entities with the account, but at least one is necessary to start using our products

salesPlan.title: AVAILABLE PLANS
salesPlan.subTitle: Choose between the Free, Bronze, or Enterprise version based on the features you need. Upgrade or change your plan at any time to enhance your experience with PassBiz.
salesPlan.branding: Branding: EncodeBiz default logo and design
salesPlan.costEstimated: Estimated cost: Variable based on usage
salesPlan.estimateRangeCustom: Estimated margin: Variable, but with potential to be significant

card1.text2: A platform created to centralize all your digital services in one place.
card1.text3: At encodeBiz we turn your ideas into digital solutions. When our services don't cover all your needs, we create what your business requires, tailored to you.

card2.text2: Before choosing a service and plan, we recommend completing your entity configuration.
card2.text5: with your organization's corporate identity in any service.
card2.text7: of your entity so that your data is available in all documents and processes on the platform.
card2.text9: of the services, complying with legal and protection requirements.

card3.text8: Issue digital credentials for employees, students, or clients.
card3.text9: Create and manage events with passes for attendees and staff.
card3.text10: Control access securely and in real time.
card3.text12: Register check-ins and check-outs with geolocation
card3.text13: , organize teams and projects, and generate real-time reports.

twoFactor.writeCode: Write the 6-digit code shown by your authentication app.
twoFactor.newDeviceMessageText: This device is now registered as your trusted device.
twoFactor.step1Text1: Add an authentication app to protect your records and settings in CheckBiz.
twoFactor.step1Text2: You can use Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Duo, Authy, or another compatible one.
twoFactor.step1Title1: Open your authentication app and choose
twoFactor.step2Text1: Write the 6-digit code shown by your authentication app.
twoFactor.step3Title1: Step 1: Copy and paste this key
twoFactor.step3Text1: Paste the key below into your authentication app, such as Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Duo, Authy, or another compatible one.
twoFactor.step4Text1: Write the 6-digit code shown by your authentication app.
twoFactor.text1Validate: To add your browser as a trusted device, enter the 6-digit code shown to you by the authenticator app.
